name: Ultimate Tic Tac Toe (Beta)
description:
ULTIMATE TIC TAC TOE by Alf

RULES:

Same as regular tic tac toe, start in the middle board.

Where you place your shape on the little board determines what board the next player must play on

- For example if you play on the bottom right on any little board, then the next player must play on the little board thats on the bottom right of the big board. Play in the middle of any little board means next player plays on the center board. 

If a player has to play on a little board thats already won, they can play on any board that isnt won, player who gets 3 in a row on the big board wins

CONTROLS:

-Click the tile with your mouse to play your shape

-Scroll to zoom in/out

-Press Q to lock the board into fullscreen (I thought the camera pan/zoom was cool but it got obnoxious after a while)

-ONLINE COMING SOMEDAY :0
